PrecisRegulations Amending the MARINE OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH REGULATIONS by introducing new requirements (Part XIV - Hazardous Occurrence Investigation, Recording and Reporting) whereby businesses in nautical industries will be required to complete and submit annual reports respecting hazardous occurrences and injuries.
